SELECT DISTINCT ( gz.max_price ) AS max_price, gz.current_price, gz.init_price, gz.yesterday_end_price, gz.created_date FROM gp_yl gz
and gz.created_date > CURRENT_DATE
and gz.created_date BETWEEN #{date} and date_add(#{date},interval 16 HOUR)
GROUP BY gz.max_price

SELECT DISTINCT ( gz.min_pirce ), gz.current_price, gz.init_price, gz.yesterday_end_price, gz.created_date FROM gp_yl gz
and gz.created_date > CURRENT_DATE
and gz.created_date BETWEEN #{date} and date_add(#{date},interval 16 HOUR)
GROUP BY gz.min_pirce

SELECT id, gp_name, gp_code, init_price, yesterday_end_price, current_price, max_price, min_pirce, turnover, number, bidding_price, auction, created_date FROM gp_yl gz WHERE gz.gp_code=#{gpCode} and gz.created_date BETWEEN #{date} and date_add(#{date},interval 16 HOUR)
ORDER BY gz.created_date DESC LIMIT 1
